Job Description: Job Description :   - Strong development skills in C#, ASP.net SQL Server(2008 R2/2012) with a minimum of 1 years relevant work experience.    - Building web and standalone applications for clients on Microsoft .NET platform.    - Experience working with MVC 4.0, Entity framework, Web Services (WebAPI), XML, JQuery, AngularJS 4/7, Object oriented JavaScript, HTML 5, CSS and SQL    - Experience in the entire software development life cycle    - Supports the deployment of solutions as needed    - Ensure coding standard    Requirements :    - Experience of enterprise-grade web application development using C# / .NET,    - Experience building service-oriented architecture, web services and APIs    - Experience with software design patterns: MVC    - Implement architecture, database design and design patterns to help ensure that systems scale.    - Apply technical expertise to challenging architecture and design problems.    - Ability to work and communicate clearly and efficiently with team members.
